history.content: Go-to-market for an AI customer support tool; budget $750k; target SMBs

A focused go-to-market strategy for SMBs could leverage digital channels and industry-specific partnerships to maximize the $750k budget. Key will be demonstrating clear ROI and ease of integration for resource-constrained small businesses. What’s the target go-live date or time window you’re driving toward?

SMB stands for Small and Medium-sized Businesses, typically defined as companies with fewer than 500 employees or under a certain revenue threshold. This market segment often has distinct needs and constraints compared to large enterprises or corporations. What’s the target go-live date or time window you’re driving toward?

With a one-year timeline, you have sufficient runway for a phased approach, starting with targeted pilot programs to refine your value proposition. This timeline allows for iterative improvements based on early adopter feedback before a broader rollout. What’s the target go-live date or time window you’re driving toward?
